relnotes.name: XML Framework
relnotes.purpose: XML parsing framework with a SAX like API, parsers are implemented as Ecom plugins into the framework creating an extensible architecture.
relnotes.defect: The listed files are now being exported to proper locations.

defect.title: Stop using dummy.exe in XML components

relnotes.defect: Removed the workaround to generate rsc files that included generating dummy.exe
xmlframework : Used temporary variables of type TPtr16.
relnotes.minorchange: "SMPSAFE" keyword added as part of Preq2051 submission to all .mmp files

defect.title: XML CParser does not document the XML plain-text encodings supported

relnotes.defect: updated CParser comments to accurately reflect the encodings that are supported

defect.title: XML parser should protect sorts of Uids from Overflow

deliverystep.name: PREQ1843: Base Services, Alignment of CBR and System Model - part 2

preq.title: Alignment of CBR and System Model - part 2

deliverystep.preq: Splitting the XML syslibs_xml CBR package into 3 CBR packages (syslibs_xml, syslibs_wbxmlparser, syslibs_xmlparser).

defect.title: String Dictionary How To document is incorrect

relnotes.defect: String Dictionary How -To document is incorrect. Prapagation from v9.3

deliverystep.name: Extension makefile changes
deliverystep.preq: Migrating the makefiles to Template Extension Makefiles.

defect.title: String Dictionary How To document is out of date

relnotes.defect: Update String Dictionary How To document by changing the method of building static string table

defect.title: Charconv Shiftjis & J5 tests need to be modified to work with new plugin default

relnotes.defect: Changed WbxmlParsertests.iby back to using charconv_all_plugins.iby instead of charconv_all_plugins_test.iby version, as Test plugins defaults are now inline with production plugin defaults

deliverystep.name: Filename policy changes
deliverystep.preq: Updating the component source files to comply with the Symbian filename policy.

defect.title: The XML parser don't leave twice when it parse several invalid xml files

relnotes.defect: XML parser now leaves everytime it processes invalid xml files
relnotes.minorchange: Symbian OS v9.3 component branched from common codeline

defect.title: File names related to Shift-JIS plug-in and default setting are not fair

relnotes.defect: Distinguished Shift-JIS plugin file names for licencees

defect.title: p: XML parser USER 130 panic parsing DRM rights object

relnotes.defect: Prevent a panic when parsing a corrupt DRM rights object
